channel.title: A few quick things (Shud be easy)
channel.description:
1.) I get this in my server [code] at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.frame61(client.java:1273) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20050 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:261) at client.frame61(client.java:1274) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 20051 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20052 at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.frame61(client.java:1273) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20053 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:261) at client.frame61(client.java:1274) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] It causes nulls ffs.
2.) whats the code to make another player get attacked, like for exmaple veng, when u veng the player gets hit from the veng, whats the code for a player getting hit? i know attackingOn2 is You, but what about the Other attacker?
3.) How can i make my gmaul say [code]You have no special energy left for this[/code] when no spec is left.
4.) why doesnt my gmaul go yellow when clicked?
5.) Lvl glitch, Help! it shud say "your oppenent needs to be in the same level as you"

item.title: A few quick things (Shud be easy)
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

1.) I get this in my server

at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.frame61(client.java:1273) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20050 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:261) at client.frame61(client.java:1274) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 20051 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20052 at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.frame61(client.java:1273) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20053 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:261) at client.frame61(client.java:1274) at client.process(client.java:18663) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
It causes nulls ffs.

2.) whats the code to make another player get attacked, like for exmaple veng, when u veng the player gets hit from the veng, whats the code for a player getting hit? i know attackingOn2 is You, but what about the Other attacker?

3.) How can i make my gmaul say You have no special energy left for this
when no spec is left.

4.) why doesnt my gmaul go yellow when clicked?

5.) Lvl glitch, Help! it shud say “your oppenent needs to be in the same level as you”

Read full topic
item.source: A few quick things (Shud be easy)
